resources.string: An interactive device which helps identify gate ICs. Displays datasheet and tutorials for the identified IC on an Android app. User-friendly Interfacing with Android phones via bluetooth/internet Interactive teaching assistant used by teachers Learning aid for high school and college studentsAn interactive device which helps identify gate ICs. Result of the detected gate will appear here
